subject: Horn cover plate (Steering wheel cover plate)
description_text:
Hi.

Do you or would you sell just the horn cover plate in the following listing AliExpress listing 1005006220198069 ??

A listing with and without logo would sell to the sim racing users.

I have been looking to buy some and cannot find them.

Happy to buy direct on your website if you had them listed.

Some nice horn cover plates sold with track map stickers for your favorite track maybe a hot item for the DIY wheel sim users

Regards Brad

[cid:image001.png@01DBDBD0.BAE4D100]

conversations.body_text: Hi Brad Mills,  We’ll discuss with our operations team tomorrow about listing a version of the horn cover without the laser-etched logo. However, we haven’t designed a matching sticker yet.
